scripts.start:dev: shx cp env.development .env && node -e "try{require('fs').copyFileSync('env.local','.env.local')}catch(e){}" && node server.js
scripts.seed: shx cp env.development .env && node -e "try{require('fs').copyFileSync('env.local','.env.local')}catch(e){}" && node scripts/seedData.js
scripts.create-admin: shx cp env.development .env && node -e "try{require('fs').copyFileSync('env.local','.env.local')}catch(e){}" && node scripts/createAdmin.js
scripts.create-chat-rooms: shx cp env.development .env && node -e "try{require('fs').copyFileSync('env.local','.env.local')}catch(e){}" && node scripts/createDefaultChatRooms.js
scripts.dev:windows: shx cp env.development .env && node -e "try{require('fs').copyFileSync('env.local','.env.local')}catch(e){}" && nodemon server.js
